item.title: LBaaS with NSX Advanced Load Balancer and Cloud Director
item.description: NSX Advanced Load Balancer (ALB) is a software-based application delivery controller that provides load balancing capabilities for applications deployed in data centers and public clouds. It offers a variety of features such as load balancing, SSL/TLS offloading, content switching, application acceleration, and advanced security.
